div.l: Be caus he was of Carpynters Crafte
A litle ire in his hert was lafte
He gan to grucche ⁊and blame it a lite
So thee qduod he ful wel cowde y þe quite
Wᵗith bleryng of a proude Millers eye
If þat me liste to speke of rebaudrye
But y am olde me liste not pley for age
Gras tyme is doon̄ / my fodder is now forage
The white topp̄e wryteth myn olde yeris
Myn herte is also mowled as myn heer is
But if y fare as doth an open ers
Þat ilke frute is euer lenger þe wers
Till it be rotyn̄ in mullok or in stree
We olde men y drede so fare wee
Til we be rotyn̄ / can not we be ripe
We hoppe alwey while þᵗat þe wordle wol pipe
For in oure will þer stekith euer a naill
To haue an hoore here ⁊and a grene tayll
As doth a leek / for þowgh oure myght be goon̄
Oure will desirith foly euer in oon̄
For when we may not doo / þen wol we speke
Yit in oure olde asshen fire is reeke
· iiij · gledes haue we which y schal deuyse
Avauntyng · leyeng · angre and Couetyse
Thise ·iiij · sparkles longen vnto elde
Oure olde lemes mowe well be vnwelde
But will ne schal faile þat is soth
And yit haue y alwey a Coltesh toth
As many yeer as it is passed henne
Sith þat my tappe of lyfe be gan̄ to renne
For sikerly when y was born̄ anon̄
Deth drowe þe tappe of lyf ⁊and lete it goon̄
And euer synne // hath þe tappe ron̄
Till þat almost all empty is þe Ton̄
The streme of life now dropeth on þe Chimbe
The sely tunge may well rynge and Chymbe
Of wrecchidnes // þat is passed full yore
Wᵗith olde folk safe Dotage is noo moore
When þat oure oost had herde þis s̉ermonynge
He be gan to speke as lordly as a kynge
And seide/ what amountyth al þis witte
Why schall we alday speke of holy writte
The Devell made a Reve for to preche
Or a Sowter · a Schipman or a leche
Sey forth þi tale and tarie not þe tyme
Loo Depford // ⁊and it is half wey to pryme
Loo Grenewyche þer many a schewe is yn̄
It were altyme þi tale for to be gyn̄
Now Seres qduod þis Oswold þe Reve
I pray you all þat ye nott greve
Þowgh y ansurre and somdelle sett his howffe
For lefull is wᵗith force / force to schowffe
This Drunkyn̄ Miller hath tolde vs here
